Jx.Scrollbar

Creates a custom scrollbar either vertically or horizontally (determined by options).  These scrollbars are designed to be styled entirely through CSS.

Copyright 2009 by Jonathan Bomgardner License: MIT-style

Based in part on ‘Mootools CSS Styled Scrollbar’ on http://solutoire.com/2008/03/10/mootools-css-styled-scrollbar/

Summary
Jx.ScrollbarCreates a custom scrollbar either vertically or horizontally (determined by options).
Options
directionDetermines which bars are visible.
useMouseWheelWhether to allow the mouse wheel to move the content.
useScrollersWhether to show the scrollers.
scrollerIntervalThe amount to scroll the content when using the scrollers.
templatethe HTML template for a scrollbar

Options

direction

Determines which bars are visible.  Valid options are ‘horizontal’ or ‘vertical’

useMouseWheel

Whether to allow the mouse wheel to move the content.  Defaults to true.

useScrollers

Whether to show the scrollers.  Defaults to true.

scrollerInterval

The amount to scroll the content when using the scrollers. useScrollers option must be true.  Default is 50 (px).

template

the HTML template for a scrollbar
